short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find quality products easily with ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is ChatGPT for Amazon?
ChatGPT for Amazon is a browser extension that enhances Amazon.com with the power of ChatGPT, enabling users to find quality products more quickly.

How does it work?
Go to Amazon.com, describe what you want, and ChatGPT for Amazon will find the best products for you. You'll also get ChatGPT for Amazon's TrueGrade and insights as you browse products.

Is ChatGPT for Amazon free to use?
Yes, it's 100% free to use.

Do I need an OpenAI/ChatGPT account?
No, you don't need an OpenAI/ChatGPT account to use ChatGPT for Amazon.
